Exela Technologies Inc Annual Shareholders Meeting
ST. LOUIS Dec 30, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Exela Technologies Inc shareholder or annual meeting Tuesday, December 29, 2020 at 3:00:00pm GMT
